This control scheme is great for local co-op, and adds an extra dimension to the game. While you push and pull each other in game, try not to do the same in real life!

item.title: Plane Accident: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1682340/Plane_Accident/

Wield advanced investigative tools and immerse yourself in the intricacies of aviation disasters in 'Plane Accident: Prologue,' as you decipher the enigma of a plane crash using cutting-edge techniques and expert analysis.

Your task will be to get to the site of the plane crash. With the help of
such tools as a drone find the likely location of the plane wreckage


and Investigate the crash site,


You will have to mark the area of the accident, find evidence


and take photos so that the entire plane wreckage is finally transported to
the hangar. Transporting the plane wreckage is only the beginning of your
investigation. To get to the causes of the crash you will have to
reconstruct the wreckage of the plane,


send parts for analysis or examine the black box.


An integral part of any investigation is questioning witnesses


and gathering all the clues to work out the true scenarioof the cause
of the crash.


Experience a tantalizing glimpse of the aviation mystery world in Plane Accident: Prologue.
But remember, what you see here is just the tip of the iceberg. Dive deeper into the full game to uncover a universe of secrets waiting to be revealed.

item.title: Rising Lords
item.description:
About This Game




Rising Lords is a medieval turn-based strategy game with card and board game elements. Send your serfs to fight and die in your name... or let them prosper, and use them to your advantage!



Collect taxes and resources. Dictate rations and field work. Forge weapons, raise armies, and build mighty fortified cities. Help your people become knights, or dump them on a battlefield far away, but be careful: even the most humble peasants will revolt eventually and an unlucky event card can change the fate of your realm quickly...



Be ready to expand your realm or defend your provinces! Relationships with other Lords are a fickle thing and you will find yourself on the battlefield sooner or later. Raise a well-rounded army, give yourself an edge through a card-based skill system and engage your enemies in mortal combat in highly tactical, grid- and turn-based encounters!



In addition to its campaign mode, Rising Lords features robust multiplayer functionality. Play a quick game, or settle in for an evening or more. Play mind games with your friends with Rising Lords’ special figures and spread false infos. Let them pay for their insolence in questioning your right to rule!

Features

  • Expand your realm - Juggle production, resource gathering, construction, diplomacy and treason, tax and rations - all vital in the success of your provinces
  • Deep tactics - Use counters to troop types, morale, terrain and cards to get the upper hand even against seemingly impossible odds
  • Prove yourself - Make use of a variety of unique figures to gain an advantage, and triumph in special game modes such as Challenge Island and Invasion
  • Up to 4-player simultaneous multiplayer - No need to wait for each individual player to take their turn
  • Customisation - Tailor your leader’s look and skills, and craft your perfect cities and troops
  • Modding support - Create your own maps and story missions for Scenario Mode and share them using Steam Workshop

item.title: Holidays in Khrushchevsk
item.description:
About This Game

Ordinary story
It’s a usual story that takes place in our time in Russia. Sasha came to Khrushchevsk town to visit his granny, whom he had not seen for a long time. He used to spend all his summers in this town when he was a little boy and knew all the children in the play yard and even neighbours. Sasha’s granny had recently felt worser, so he decided to visit her. He should figure out is it a real disease or something else…

Holidays in Khrushchevsk is a psychological horror game in the genre of "walking simulator"
Average game completion time: 50 minutes


Holidays in Khrushchevsk is a game that will be familiar to everyone who grew up in Russia and the CIS. The developer tried to make the atmosphere of the past and to reveal some problems that exist at the moment. The story took place last summer.


IMPORTANT NOTE:
The main emphasis of the game is on the process of exploration, as the tension slowly builds up, creating an even more complete and vivid effect of presence.

DESCRIPTION OF CONTENT FOR ADULTS
The developer describes the content like this:
The game contains scenes of violence that can cause negative impact on the psyche. The game also contains scenes of alcohol or drugs, as well as elements that may not be suitable for people of a certain age. A reasonable restriction of the audience of the game is recommended.

Game Features:
- The main genre of the game is "Walking Simulator";
- The gameplay is close to realism.
- You will need to study carefully the environment to complete the game
- It’s better to read all notes and assignments to understand the plot

item.title: Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye
item.description:
About This Game


Immerse yourself in the shadows, where danger lurks and every step leads you further to the edge of madness. Navigate the neon-lit streets as robo-detective Philip Log and search for Jenny Montage, the automated femme fatale, in this gritty post-apocalyptic saga. Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye brings you a whole new epic standalone tale to unfold. Solve sinister mysteries using your extendo-arms, and unravel the secrets of the city of robots. .


The story of Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye is set a year after the events depicted in The Secret of Retropolis, and continues the story of Philip Log, the hard-boiled robo-detective, and Jenny Montage, the automated femme fatale that just can’t keep herself out of trouble.

Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye welcomes new visitors to the city of robots, and can be experienced as its own self contained adventure .


The Retropolis series is a user-friendly VR experience built from the ground up to support effortless VR interaction. Using Philip Log’s extendo-arms, the player is able to collect items from afar, use them to overcome obstacles, and move the plot forward. On top of the first game’s mechanics, Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye features enchanted logic puzzles, new rotation mechanics, and movement between different environments, offering a more challenging adventure with a substantially longer playtime.


Even though set in a post-apocalyptic cityscape inhabited only by robots, all 3D assets in Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye were hand painted by living and breathing human beings, making each environment a stunningly detailed piece of art. With improved graphics and character animation, returning to Retropolis is more jaw dropping than ever. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of the city and search for hidden jokes.


Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye was written and directed with the belief that VR games will be the basis of entertainment in the 21st century. We see no difference between cinema, anime, and gaming. Our mission is to blend them all together and shape the future of narrative driven games.

item.title: Chiyo
item.description:
About This Game


CHIYO is a first person, escape room styled, single player, puzzle game set in a Edo era Japan horror background and in the same universe of MALICE.

Play as Idate Chiyo, a newly recruited paranormal investigator of the Tokugawa Shogunate's Magical Arcane Division, tasked with her first assignment to investigate some strange occurrences reported to have originated from an abandoned mansion on the forested interior of the small coastal city of Gōtsu in Shimane Prefecture. Within the mansion, Chiyo encounters strange and malevolent spirits, devious contraptions and puzzles and a dark family history that will threaten her survival.


Join our Discord Server for Lore, Discussions or just to Chat!

Escape Room Style Puzzle Game

Challenge your wits and your nerves with escape room style puzzles and ghostly presence haunting your every step.

Assume the Role of Idate Chiyo

Activate unique supernatural powers allowing players to pierce and dive into the paranormal realm as a paranormal investigator of the Tokugawa Shogunate's Magical Arcane Division.

Engaging Storyline

Uncover the mysteries of an abandoned mansion, a powerful family’s dark dealings and the consequences of love and sacrifice.

Immersive Horror

Delve into atmospheric nightmares of an ancient Edo era mansion and uncover all it's mysteries and malevolence.

item.title: Super Algebrawl
item.description:
About This Game

Super Algebrawl is a byte-sized tactics puzzle RPG where you control a boar king with magical mathematical powers! The king can add up and multiply his animal underlings to match whatever enemy opposes him! He is on a quest for glory, slaying the horrible monsters that plague the animal realm, and recruiting valiant heroes to add up to his numbers.

Every encounter is a puzzle to be solved with logic and simple algebra! Get access to more mathematical operations as you progress, expand your party, and gain special powers, so that you may manipulate your party's values to match the enemies'. If all else fails, the boar king can fight too... But if he loses all his health it's game over.

The game features 3 different areas to complete, each with their unique monsters and boss to beat, with 4 difficulty modifiers​ which you can toggle on or off before starting an area. The game plays entirely with the mouse and it typically takes about 20 minutes to complete an area.

item.title: Twinkle Hunter
item.description:
About This Game

Twinkle Hunter is boss rush game with action's element. It is greatly inspired from Cuphead made by Studio MDHR, 2017.




Various Bosses


About 20 thieves with various design and movement threat you. As a hunter, you must arrest them interrupting you and finally retrieve your teddy bear from Plague, a member of thieves.


Challenging Combat, the key is DODGING


Thieves will fight with all their might. Sometimes a strong boss may make you despair, but it makes the sense of victory bigger. When you fight with them, attack is important, but the key is dodging their attack.


Change your equipment for the battle!


From Active Skills for a mighty attack to Charms for new actions! Use around 20 equipments to make your gameplay various and attack bosses' weakness.

item.title: Fantôme
item.description:
About This Game

Fantôme invites you to explore haunted places, secure dark relics, and survive encounters with a menacing madman and evil spirits. Face challenging bosses as you strive to claim the relics and escape.

Players can team up with up to three friends for added terror in co-op mode!

Your primary aim is to secure the dark relic and emerge unharmed, facing chilling horrors and relentless challenges, whether you're alone or competing with friends. Can you endure the madness and achieve victory?

Key Features

  • Lone Player - Face the madness alone, secure dark relics in a chilling atmosphere, and escape the abyss.

  • Multiplayer - Compete with friends in co-op mode with up to 3 players.

  • Immersive Experience - Blend into the world of horrors, with a realistic atmosphere that gives a chilling experience.

  • Am I alone? - Stay vigilant - immersive gameplay means jumpscares when you least expect them, sending chills down your spine!

item.title: Turnip Boy Robs a Bank
item.description:
About This Game



Turnip Boy is ready to commit more felonies in this comedic action-adventure game with roguelite elements. This time the career criminal is teaming up with the fearsome Pickled Gang to plan and execute the weirdest heist of all time! Shake down hostages, steal precious valuables, and explore the deep, dark depths and history of the Botanical Bank.

To pull off the perfect heist, you’ll need to purchase an array of dangerous and wacky tools from the dark web, including a diamond pickaxe, C4, and… a cardboard box? However, bank robbing isn’t easy, so be prepared for intense shootouts with security guards, the fuzz, elite swat teams and more!



  • A thrilling single-player adventure full of bank robbing, dark web browsing, and fuzz fighting.
  • Roguelite elements to turnip the action.
  • A big ol’ bank to explore and loot.
  • An array of wacky weapons.
  • Take on whoever the bank throws at you in intense shootouts, from security guards to elite veggie swat teams!
  • A large cast of quirky food-based characters, including some familiar faces and new citizens with their own stories and problems.
  • Earn collectable hats to wear and new banger tracks to blast.
  • Discover a deeper history of Turnip Boy’s world and how it became what it is.

item.title: Void Wars
item.description:
About This Game

With the discovery of the voids, the galaxy is pulled into war.

Dodge, shoot and free the galaxy of the evil space mega corp. Use a variety of different weapons and spaceships, each with different playstyles to overcome many challenging levels.

Game feature:

- 3 different campaigns, each with 12 levels
- Unlock a 'hard' mode, to replay each level with more challenge!
- Multiple screen filling exciting boss fights
- Multiple weapons, each providing a different playstyle
- Unlock different spaceships, each having its own pros and cons

item.title: Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Wars
item.description:
About This Game



Fantasy Kommander invites you to embark on a strategic journey through a medieval-inspired isometric realm of fantasy, with 90s style pre-rendered graphics for an immersive retro experience. Set on a hex map filled with diverse terrains, this operational-level strategy game presents a real high quality window into games of the past, with challenging battles, engaging character voice overs, and a competent AI opponent.

Battles take place on a hexagonal map and are regulated by our complex proprietary tactical simulation system "Archangelus" which for each clash considers multiple factors such as terrain, ZOCs (zones of control), morale, orientation, the combat fronts, the offensive and defensive power and the specific typology of each unit.



At the beginning of each battle you can deploy units that each represent hundreds of soldiers, but there are also unique units such as heroes and dragons. Each unit is similar in structure to a classic role-playing game character, with distinct characteristics and special abilities that can be improved by levelling them up thanks to the accumulation of experience points on the battlefield.

The plot unfolds within four compelling campaigns narratively linked to each other. In the role of a valiant general who finds himself in the midst of a devastating war that has broken out for unknown reasons, you will receive messages from Emperor Karl and the Grand Council of Mages that will guide you to discover a mysterious enemy plotting in the shadows.

Alongside you stand three mighty Heroes representing Humans, Elves, and Dwarves, ready to assist in your trials, challenges, and triumphs. Explore the great Empire of Adamantia, invaded by the forces of Kaos, and venture into mysterious uncharted lands as you seek victory and freedom.



Each campaign consists of multiple battles with primary and secondary objectives of escalating difficulty. As you progress, you'll unlock victory levels determined by completing objectives within time limits, with "Epic" Victories making you richer and more famed. Achieving higher levels rewards you with gold, fame points, and various benefits such as unit upgrades, resurrection of fallen troops, new powers, and expanded recruitment options. Visit the encampment after battles to level up your army.



Lead your troops strategically by deploying them before each battle, considering facing and movement options. Engage in melee and ranged combat, utilizing spells and missile weapons to gain an edge. With 32 special abilities, 32 spells, and six different races, the tactical possibilities are vast.



Remember that you can only move one unit at a time, and combat follows a strictly symmetrical turn-based approach. Adapt to these constraints and overcome the scripted challenges that lie ahead.

Features:
  • Complex Battle System incorporating various tactical factors
  • Immersive storyline inspired by European medieval traditions and fantasy narratives
  • Four single-player campaigns with 25 epic battles, heroes, enemy generals, and side quests
  • Over 70 unique units to recruit, upgrade, and unleash upon the battlefield
  • RPG-like units with customizable stats and abilities
  • Powerful spells to wield and hordes of enemies to face

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2363700/Eukarion_Tales_2/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2482360/Eukarion_Tales_Origins/

Developer Note:

This game is part of AgeofGames list of re-released videogame artifacts, developed by a small indie team using the full potential and limitations of development technology now phased out of use. We apologize for any technical problems or inconveniences you may encounter in your playthrough, unfortunately we no longer have the ability or opportunity to enter into the code, make meaningful edits or updates to the build of the game. We hope that with these limitations in mind, you may still enjoy the experience!

item.title: Rocket Smash
item.description:
About This Game

Description

Rocket Smash is a minimalist 2D physics and destruction arcade game. Navigate through countless arena levels, relentlessly smashing, bashing and crashing into enemy rockets to annihilate them. This game is all about precision, strategy, and the joy of destruction!


Controls

Rocket Smash is extremely easy to pick up and play. You'll only need your mouse - just point and click!


Campaign

The campaign comprises numerous arena-style levels, grouped into sets of ten. In each set, you'll encounter fresh enemy types and interactive objects, with the ultimate challenge waiting in the form of a boss battle on the last level. Plus, the excitement never ends, as new levels will be released every single week, ensuring there's always more to conquer in the campaign!


Enemies

Within this game, you'll face more than 40 different enemy types. Each enemy has a unique ability, and more difficult enemies will adopt multiple enemy abilities! As you progress through the campaign you will also encounter faster, stronger and more powerful variants of each enemy that will push your Rocket Smashing skills to their limits!

Soundtrack

Music is a big part of Rocket Smash - each level set is accompanied by an upbeat and energetic track that perfectly complements the action. Get ready to groove to the rhythm of each level as you smash your way to victory!

item.title: Temple of Aeryn
item.description:
About This Game



  • Explore a vast world full of danger and uncover its mysteries.
  • Summon creatures and cast mighty spells to defeat your enemies in a unique turn-based combat system.
  • Focus your spirit to learn new spells and evolve your Spellbook.

item.title: Puzzle Club
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the Puzzle Club, a mysterious and challenging puzzle game. In this game, you need to solve various complex puzzles to uncover the secrets behind them. The game includes various types of puzzles, such as numeric passwords, graphic passwords, text passwords, etc. At the same time, there are many hidden clues and Easter eggs in the game that can only be discovered by attentive players.

During the puzzle-solving process, you need to use your observation skills, logical thinking, and reasoning abilities to successfully solve each puzzle. The game also sets up puzzles of various difficulties, so whether you are a beginner or an experienced player in puzzle-solving, you can find the right challenge for yourself in the game.

item.title: The Pony Factory
item.description:
About This Game



Winston arrived at a solution to the moral decay of his town.

He called out to hell, and hell answered. The human body could, hell promised, be twisted and stretched into a kinder, more equine shape. Winston's town, now filled with ignorant hate-mongers, could instead be filled with magical ponies, if he could provide a factory in which to make them. Winston thought they would be beautiful, gentle, and good.

Hell had other plans...

FEATURES

  • Meaty FPS combat against highly agile foes who will attempt to evade and flank you.
  • Darkness is your enemy! Use muzzle flashes, sparks, sound, and other clues to track foes during combat.
  • High contrast black and white aesthetic inspired by early 1950's science fiction films.
  • A short minimalist campaign that can be completed in about 30 minutes.
  • Numerous improvements from the original release, including many new quality of life features, balance and game feel improvements, new story and gameplay content, full gamepad support, and of course bugfixes!

Originally made in 7 days for The Dread X Collection as an exercise in doing a lot with a little, The Pony Factory is a horror FPS inspired by Doom 3, with a striking aesthetic and dark sense of humor.

item.title: Power Punch
item.description:
About This Game

Game description:

《Power Punch》 is a VR multiplayer competitive game that combines sports rehabilitation and entertainment! In this exciting virtual boxing world, you can not only experience the intense boxing duel, but also have a full-body workout through the game to enhance your physical fitness and improve your health.
Simple operation, no matter you are a novice or veteran player of VR games, you can quickly get started and feel the fun of boxing. In the game, your task is to blast your opponent out of the ring through strategy and skill. Every punch is not only a challenge to your opponent, but also a workout for your physical ability.


The game style is funny and humorous, with several exaggerated expressions, head tilted, spasm, face twisted... etc., will let you in the intense and exciting boxing duel, but also can feel the relaxed and happy atmosphere, so that the game is full of joy and fun. In addition to the basic sparring mode, there are also diverse combat scenarios, the game's help players to improve boxing skills at the same time, to achieve the effect of exercise. Whether in exciting matches or in daily fitness training, you will feel the full commitment and sense of accomplishment.

By the way, " the uppercut " can hit the opponent higher and farther - Let's punch hard!


Features:

  • Fitness combined with entertainment: play the game and achieve the purpose of physical exercise at the same time.
  • Easy to learn: Both novice and experienced players can quickly get into the fight.
  • Whole Body Exercise: Every swing is a physical challenge.
  • Various training: Rich training modules to meet different fitness needs.
  • Fun Interaction: Humorous game style and exaggerated expressions add fun.


《Power Punch》 is not only an exciting boxing duel, but also a comprehensive physical training. Join us now to make exercise more fun and make health your new goal in the game! Reliable test data proves that sticking to 15 minutes a day can improve your physical fitness by almost 30%.

item.title: Exiled
item.description:
About This Game

Charlotte is missing.

A note has been left on her desk talking of "the ancient evil" and "banishment to a different realm." The eldritch tome and an untranslated scrap she had been studying act as the only clues to her disappearance. Use clues found in the book to translate an ancient language, evade the lurking horrors, and solve the mystery of the strange objects around you!

This is a compact, detailed puzzle thriller similar to The Room and Myst. The player can inspect items, use clues, and slowly crack the mystery of the Great Library.

By John Szymanski, director of My Friendly Neighborhood.

Features

  • Solve ancient puzzles, decode an eldritch language, and avoid the lurking horror all while sitting at a single desk
  • Tense and foreboding atmosphere where the stillness of the library can be shattered at any moment
  • High level of interactivity
  • Multiple endings
  • Good for a single play session
  • Voiceover by Tom Schalk

The original version was released in Dread X Collection 2.

item.title: Mystery Society 2: Hidden Puzzles
item.description:
About This Game



Immerse yourself in the captivating world of this hidden object adventure, where you'll explore a variety of locations with unique tasks that will challenge your detective skills. Classic hidden object scenes with named items, shadow silhouettes, and thrilling "find the difference" puzzles are just the beginning. You'll be drawn into the heart of the mystery as you navigate through a collection of diverse and intriguing scenarios that will put your observation skills to the test.


But the excitement doesn't stop there! This game also features engaging puzzles that add another layer of entertainment to your crime-solving adventure. Exercise your strategic thinking and quick reflexes as you clear the board of colorful jewels, uncovering precious artifacts and unlocking hidden secrets along the way. With each successful match, you'll be one step closer to uncovering the truth behind the criminal underworld.


Join the ranks of the elite detectives in a secret organization, and embark on a riveting story of adventure and intrigue. You'll be tasked with finding unique treasures and collections, and as you do, you'll uncover the enigmatic tale of a secret society that operates in the shadows. Travel across three continents, from the bustling streets of New York to the exotic landscapes of Asia, uncovering hidden gems and solving crimes that have stumped the world's finest detectives.



As you dive deeper into the game, you'll collect unique artifacts and objects, forming stunning collections that reveal the rich history and secrets of the secret organization. With each new discovery, you'll gain valuable rewards and unlock powerful tools to aid you in your quest. Share your progress with friends, trade items, and join forces to uncover the hidden truth that lies beneath the surface. With a vast array of hidden object scenes, puzzles, and a captivating story, this hidden object adventure is the ultimate game for both new and experienced players alike.

item.title: Choc N Roll
item.description:
About This Game


It's time to get the ball rolling, but slow down! Be careful what you roll yourself into because too much chocolate can be harmful to you! Prepare to wind down and melt away as you enter the sweet world of Choc N Roll! Play as a chocolate ball and avoid candy themed obstacles in this endless ball rolling experience!



Swap your ball colour between chocolate and strawberry to travel through colour gates! Make sure you have the correct colour, otherwise you will get a game over!



All tiles will appear in a random order and spawn endlessly as you play, you may notice newer more challenging tiles as you reach higher scores! Each time you play you can encounter an unpredictable experience!



Dodge candylicious and chocotastic obstacles, one wrong turn and you could get a game over!



Play to reach new highscores and compare your scores with your friends!



Collect coins to increase your score multiplier! The more coins you collect, the higher the multiplier will go. Some coins will be more risky to collect than others, so think wisely about which coins you will aim for!

item.title: Dogs Huddled Together 挤在一起的狗狗们
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to "Dogs Huddled Together" - a therapeutic puzzle game featuring adorable dogs. Each puzzle piece is a cute dog, and you can freely adjust the difficulty. The game includes two fun puzzle modes to help you relax with hundreds of dogs!

-----Game Controls------

- Use the left mouse button to move a puzzle piece.
- Click the right mouse button to rotate a puzzle piece.
- Press the R key to rotate the selected puzzle piece.
- Press the W key to shuffle and redeal.
- Press the Q key to hide or show the game UI.
- Settings allow individual toggling of the level base's frame.
- Settings allow individual toggling of the hint function.
- Settings allow individual toggling of dog sound effects.

-----Game Features------

- Hundreds of adorable hand-drawn dogs.
- 32 levels with varying numbers of pieces.
- Freely adjustable difficulty levels.
- Immersive puzzle experience.
- Cute dog sound effects.
- Relaxing background music.

------------------------

item.title: Estellina
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into a vibrant, retro 3D adventure with Estellina, a fast-paced 3d platformer & runner that will ignite your nostalgia for classic arcade games!

Embark on a journey through a colorful bright universe brimming with challenging scenarios. Solve puzzles on the fly and dodge treacherous obstacles as you race for the highest score and ultimate galactic glory.

Features:

  • Thrilling On-the-Fly Puzzle Solving: Think fast and strategize your path through mind-bending puzzles that demand quick reflexes and razor-sharp wit.

  • Score-Chasing Frenzy: Push your limits and rack up points as you maneuver through each level. Can you claim the title of the galaxy's greatest star?

  • Reflex-Testing Obstacles: Dodge and weave through perilous hazards that will put your dexterity to the ultimate test. Stay focused and avoid collisions at all costs!

item.title: Chalo Chalo
item.description:
About This Game

Really slow racing for 3 to 8 players

Chalo Chalo is a racing game that doesn't focus on speed, but on tactical choices and outsmarting your friends. You compete locally with three to eight players at the same time on the same screen.

A unique landscape is generated for each race. During the countdown you make a plan, taking into account the terrain, your opponents and the power pickups.

With a special power, or just a simple nudge, you can send an opponent off track, sometimes with fatal consequences. But when the others are closing in, be sure you can pull it off without harming your own position.

Local Multiplayer

Please be aware that Chalo Chalo has no single player, two player or online multiplayer modes. You need three to eight people with a controller each to play.

Note from the developer

Through the years we've shown Chalo Chalo at different festivals and conferences and it's especially in these settings that the game thrives. The recommended ingredients being:
- A large enough group of people. You can play the game with three people, but we've always felt the game starts to shine with 5 or more.
- A big screen. Bigger is better here.
- A bunch of controllers. We typically used a mix of both wired and wireless Xbox 360 controllers, but any controller recognized by Windows should work.

item.title: Matadouro: Grindhouse
item.description:
About This Game

Raul Jacques, an uncompromisable detective with a past colored in red investigates a season of kidnappings thought to be related until, Maria, a medical student with a bright future, is the next unfortunate soul. Fed up with the forces lack of care, the detective goes rogue and sets off to find out what is going on until his search leads him to an abandoned slaughtered house.

There he must endure horrors, uncovering a mysterious of a cannibal cult, and the inhumane experiments done to the kidnapped victims, fighting experimental monsters and cultists alike, on a struggle for survival and saving the girl.

Matadouro: Grindhouse is a first person shooter survival horror, features a variety of weapons and enemies, exploration of atmospheric and gruesome environments, and puzzle solving, with backtracking and resource management like classics of horror.

item.title: 少女与机甲/Girls And Robots
item.description:
About This Game

In the apocalyptic world, you have to face endless monsters. Now pick up your weapons and start fighting! You must choose the right girl and robot to form a unique team to complete different challenges. Find and discover the truth of world destruction and ways to save the world. Strive to survive, evolve, find the cause of the world's destruction in the midst of gunfire and bullets, and strive to save the world from monsters!

item.title: Animal Race Party
item.description:
About This Game

In Animal Race Party, the main objective is to race through tracks, collecting gold stars to secure victory. Each player can choose from six cute animals, each possessing a unique skill that can be strategically used to gain an advantage. Get ready for an exhilarating racing experience filled with fun, competition, and unpredictable moments!

item.description:

ROAD

Features:

Collect Coins
Magnets
Boosters
Overcome Obstacles
Moving Plates
Rain Storms
Other Cars
Fun Music
Cool Visuals
Settings
Score Saves

item.title: Three Kingdoms Zhao Yun
item.description:
About This Game

- Dive into 12 complete story chapters
- Choose from 3 difficulty levels, with a minimum of 30 hours experience of main storyline.
- Master 4 distinct weapon systems: spears, bows and arrows, swords, and steeds, supplemented by equipment systems like crafting, sets, refinement, and enchantment.
- Explore no fewer than 30 expansive maps.
- Encounter dozens of well-known Chinese historical figures, who will either fight by your side or become your adversaries.
- Enjoy a wide range of visually striking outfits for the protagonist and companions.
- Engage in several large-scale, renowned battles that truly capture the essence of the Three Kingdoms atmosphere.
